mapper.select: select re_no, re_title, re_content, re_date, re_chk, rnum from (select re_no, re_title, re_content, re_date, re_chk, rownum as rnum from (select re_no, re_title, re_content, to_char(re_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as re_date, re_chk from review order by re_no desc) where rownum <= #{end_data}) where rnum >= #{start_data}
select re_no from review where re_no = #{re_no}
mapper.insert: insert into review(re_no, re_title, re_content, re_pwd) values(#{re_no}, #{re_title}, #{re_content}, #{re_pwd})
mapper.select: select nvl((select 1 from review where re_no=#{re_no} and re_pwd=#{re_pwd}), 0)as state from dual
mapper.update: update review set re_content = #{re_content}, re_date = sysdate where re_no = #{re_no}
